Sponsorship blocksÂ¶

Sponsorship blocks are created in the system using these steps:

  1. Create a basic block. At this point, let Gwen know that the block is created. She will need to work with the developers for the remaining steps.

Technical steps:

  1. A block visibility group is defined. This determines where a block appears. This can be limited to specific:

  • Term reference

  • Content level

  • Specific pages if required

  1. The block is placed in legal content using the layout builder

  2. The configuration is saved.
